lender.name: Ellen

lender.name: Heather and Alex

lender.name: Molly
lender.occupation: Current legal analyst and future Ph.D. student.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: it's a great oppotunity to make a difference in someone's personal struggle for success.

lender.name: Tony
lender.whereabouts: Pocklington YORK East Riding of Yorkshire

lender.occupational_info: I own a very small computer software company - we help small to medium sized businesses in the UK get more efficient by using software properly.

lender.name: Danh
lender.loan_because: I want to improve the world.
lender.occupational_info: I help people acheive the dream of homeownership.

lender.name: Marcin
lender.loan_because: This is just the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I work for a fund that collects money from investors and invests them by buying businesses that are in a need for restructuring or funds for expansion. We help the business grow, sometimes by financing acquisitions of similar businesses. After a couple of years we sell the businesses, hopefully for more money that we have invested.

lender.name: Mieke
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a fair chance.

lender.name: Harun
lender.loan_because: I believe it makes a difference
lender.occupational_info: I study law at the University of Amsterdam (UVA)

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: we all need a little help sometime
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse that supports women giving birth.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: It takes a lot of courage and money to become an entrepreneur...and I'm here to help with the latter.

lender.name: Crossroads
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed to be a blessing.

lender.name: J Zwemmer
lender.loan_because: I want to do something for somebody else

lender.name: OpenMoves Inc
lender.loan_because: We can!
lender.occupational_info: Help businesses communicate effectively with their community of clients and prospects using email.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Working on computational biochemistry research using supercomputers.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: own a small trucking company

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: People should have a chance to make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I work with elderly people helping them to recover from medical problems so they can go home.

lender.name: Leonard
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do if one can.
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: Sonya
lender.loan_because: I want to help those that want to help themselves.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: It,s a great way to help improve people lives so they can provide for there children and family members.

lender.name: Will
lender.loan_because: All the cries of thirsty children this is my inheritance; all the rage of watching mothers this is my greatest offense. -- Jars of Clay (ish)
lender.occupational_info: I make computers do what they were meant to do.

lender.name: Marty
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to help those who work to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional brewer, brewing beer in a small craftbrewery.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy

lender.name: Narayan
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help people; It is all about positive karma; this is my investment in earning goodwill.
lender.occupational_info: Systems Analysis and Programming

lender.name: Laura
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor at a university in the United States.

lender.name: The jOhnson Family
lender.loan_because: jOhnsons care

lender.name: Gerben
lender.occupational_info: full-time university student 'Industrial Engineering & Management'.

lender.name: Borris
lender.loan_because: many small steps may also change something

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I want to help others. Several of my loans are to Cambodians because this country has a special place in my heart after my internship at the local NGO CWCC in 2005.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: The reason I loan is to give others the money they need for them to achieve their goals and dreams.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I am also a small business owner.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: I feel like it's time to start rebalancing the wealth distribution in the world, and allow other people to get the same opportunities that those more priveliged do.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently enrolled in a business and political studies program at a university here in Canada. I'm studying a lot, doing essays, and in my spare time, I'm on the campus radio station.

lender.name: jay
lender.loan_because: It reminds me that I can make a difference, even a small difference, in someone else's life
lender.occupational_info: I write stories for publications and create communications programs for small companies. I also sketch places I visit using watercolors (which I usually give to friends).

lender.name: Mark T Pease
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs an opportunity. I was blessed to be born in the United States. These people work just as hard as we do if not more. I respect hardworkers.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate loan manager. I make loan decisions to help people buy homes.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Harry
lender.occupational_info: I write about spirituality and help others along their spirtual paths through my speaking engagements , life coaching and writing.

lender.name: The Bird Team
lender.loan_because: family is life. The return on investing in families changes the world!

lender.name: Wes
lender.loan_because: I find it truly amazing that the simple act of giving can provide poor people with optimistic plans for the future and help households cope with everyday life. I hope that my loans will lead to a greater investment in educating children and empowering women. Last, but not least, I hope my loans can influence and improve not only physical, but also psychological health.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate student in psychology at the University of Oslo (Norway).

lender.name: Devin
lender.loan_because: those who need capital should be able to get it from those who have it.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.occupational_info: I work in a law firm and make jewelry in my free time.

lender.name: Suzanne and Kim
lender.loan_because: It's important to empower others to have the ability to take control of their destiny and realize their dreams...
lender.occupational_info: We help make wireless communications possible and ensure the laws that affect health care are followed

lender.name: Svanhild
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, and I like thinking of giving a loan. When the money is payed back, i can loan them to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I am working in an office. I also like to sew.

lender.name: robie
lender.loan_because: change is best accomplished by the unified masses
lender.occupational_info: Undertaking a study of infantile undernutrition in Peru.

lender.name: damara
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Everybody should have opportunity

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I was taught that if I need help, I should ask for it and if I can offer help, I should do so with an open heart.
lender.occupational_info: My organization helps companies hire and retain the best employees.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I want to give assistance to people who have dreams and vision and are willing to work to make them come alive.

lender.name: lorena
lender.loan_because: i am lucky enough to be able

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I Care about others and I want to help change peoples lives. I want to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a elementary school student

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: I love directly being able to help somebody who needs it. Plus, I prefer to give a loan rather than a donation because a loan gives the receiver dignity and pride in repayment.
lender.occupational_info: I teach science to children ages 13-18.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Galatians 6:9-10 says, Let us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up. Therefore, as we have opportunity, let us do good to all people.

lender.name: Henry
lender.loan_because: I care!

lender.name: maggie
lender.loan_because: This is the singular most powerful way of breaking the chain of poverty. It is my privilege and my honour to contribute to that.
lender.occupational_info: I work in business development for a global financial services company. I get to work with interesting people, I have great friends and family and see the raw power of this program.

lender.name: North West Subway Group
lender.whereabouts: Maple Grove MN, OR, UT, WA

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I have no reason not to.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I can help different people over and over with the same money. I don't have to have to give away lots of money to make a difference.

lender.name: Rex
lender.loan_because: It is better to give than to receive. Jesus Christ sacrificed everything and gave us the ultimate gift - eternal life for those that believe in HIM.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: This is just dern cool. I love the idea of a relatively small sum of mine helping someone out in a meaningful way.
lender.occupational_info: It's hard to say. Doing administrative office work to pay the bills (and fund a few small Kiva loans) while writing on the side.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Because of my profession, I have a real sense of how much such relatively small amounts can impact on peoples' lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professor of Modern International History & Politics particularly the relationship between Asia and the West.

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: this feels like a way to reach someone directly with even a small bit of help.
lender.occupational_info: I type medical records on patients from doctors on a computer all day

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: It helps people help themselves

lender.name: Ina Mae & the Sea Arrows
lender.occupation: students and Musicians and sea arrows
lender.loan_because: it is an effective way to challenge corporate power and provide an opportunity for those born without one. Kiva also helps reestablish international trust, which is necessary to build effective communities.

lender.name: Susan Spencer
lender.loan_because: To give back and to help others create a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a fine artist, cultural worker and teacher. I teach studio art at Queens College in New York City and advise MFA graduates.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: I love the feeling of being able to directly help someone improve their lives through my financial support.
lender.occupational_info: I provide people with household goods to help them lead better lives

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I want to do the Lord's work in the World.
lender.occupational_info: Career Counselor

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I have experienced many hardships in life and know how wonderful it is to get a hand up every now and then
lender.occupational_info: Helping to deliver babies

lender.name: Marguerite
lender.loan_because: I like to support people who are using their energy and their creativity to help themselves and their families.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I want to do something to directly help someone I don't know. I have so much to be thankful for, and feel so blessed and lucky that I want to share what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school (teenagers) and my subject is English, literature and language. I also write novels for young adults (teens).

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because:
it's an actual way to make a difference in someone's life.
"Be the change you wish to see in the world"
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my two small children and also work out of the home two days a week.

lender.name: R.Dodger
lender.loan_because: One person CAN make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am semi-retired. I have had hundreds of jobs but more than anything I have ever done, I get most satisfaction out of tinkering.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: in my own small way, I'd like to make a difference in the world, and help someone else make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Raising future men... what could be more challenging!

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: ONE LOVE, ONE HEART

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I am a world citizen

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: Would like you to get a head start.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired

lender.name: Jordan
lender.occupational_info: I work in energy and environment research, looking for ways to move the world forward into a cleaner, more progressive era.

lender.name: Ali
lender.loan_because: If everyone loaned to the less fortunate the world would be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: The agony of homework I have to carry around in my 30 lb backpack everyday.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: it is awesome to be able to help people in developing countries in such a direct way.
lender.occupational_info: I help university students to be successful in their studies.

lender.name: Antonio Raffaele
lender.loan_because: a helping hand always comes back to pat you in the back.
lender.occupational_info: Personal Chef and Catering service in San Diego....

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I care, and I want to be part of the solution.
lender.occupational_info: I have been in the field of commercial banking for over 27 years. I enjoy my career but feel the need to support micro lending to empower people in need is very important.

lender.name: Mark & Teddi
lender.loan_because: helping other human beings is what makes us human
lender.occupational_info: I work with a team of people who provide information about medicines to doctors, pharmacists and nurses.

lender.name: Chris & Tim
lender.loan_because: we feel like we're helping to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Ola Rynge
lender.loan_because: I think micro loans are a great way of supporting people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with helping people start and fund their businesses.

lender.name: Kathe
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful idea and I want to share some of what I have.

lender.name: Anibal Guzman
lender.loan_because: Lending money to people in need to help start their own business and become self sustained makes a lasting impact.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital fixing computers used by healthcare providers.

lender.name: Ginger
lender.loan_because: I want others in the world to have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a college. making sure we offer the courses people need to find jobs or enter advanced studies in their field of choice.

lender.name: DavidD
lender.loan_because: It's an excellent way to help change this world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I work at changing the world through computer technology.

lender.name: Elena
lender.loan_because: i am very impressed about the kiva concept. this is such an effective and beautiful way to really help.
lender.occupational_info: what i do might seem irrelevant to someone who is fighting for survival... as I work in the marketing department of an IT Company. This means that I arrange for market informaiton, folders, the website, attendance of fairs and congresses.

lender.name: Jivan
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing.

lender.name: Hallvard
lender.loan_because: I used to work in a bank, and after starting a new career, I miss lending people money :)

lender.name: Jan R
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is a great idea to make you personally involved in helping people to take a lot of small steps towards a better world
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Swedsh civil servant with a European and Global perspective

lender.name: Family Heessels
lender.loan_because: We have it and they need it. It is as simple as that. It would be unimaginable for us not to do this. We wish everyone who needs a loan to get one, so we can help eachother. We are indebted to our childeren to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Dad: works in a chocolate factory. Mam: works at a stewards office. Our son enjoys his childhood.

lender.name: Marco
lender.loan_because: I want to help people!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Where else could $25 make such a difference to a person and family. To us it's a couple lunches or a dinner, for them it's life.
lender.occupational_info: I make kits for people to build models of buildings for miniature, model railroads.

lender.name: Heinz
lender.loan_because: I like to see the destination,and result of my investment. It gives me a lot of pleasure, and if it helps someone so much the better.
lender.occupational_info: With the exception of Kiva, I invest in companies for profit - so far quite successfully.

lender.name: Purdom
lender.loan_because: together we can change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to work with fragile archives and libraries. My focus will be to preserve endangered collections and expand access to them.

lender.name: Morten
lender.loan_because: Not all white men are evil.

lender.name: Daniel peter
lender.loan_because: i have a clothes business in kisumu, and a project of oprhans and widows so i help them i need to boost my business and also to expand the district were i am doing the project as per now is on nyawita location we have 20 widows and 25 oprhans so i gate funds from donation to up keep them thanks
lender.occupational_info: i have a cloths business and also i have a ophanage i have 20 widows and 25 ophans that i am assisting to earn aliving and live possitive life like other people in the society i servive through Donation to up-keep this people so i will be very glad to get alone i am alos employed with aresearch organization thanks all of you

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I believe I can make a difference.

lender.name: Hans
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help directly, without redtape or overhead.
lender.occupational_info: Informing and advising small entrepreneurs how to be succesful.

lender.name: Sameeksha
lender.loan_because: Opportunity is random and subjective.

lender.name: Mike
lender.occupational_info: I own a company that makes games for cellphones.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I owe
lender.occupational_info: I make glass beads for jewelry.

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because: sometimes people just need help.

lender.name: Andy and Wendy
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lender.name: Stewart
lender.loan_because: I want (and am able) to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I provide information technology and zoology consultancy services.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: We need to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a computer manufacturer/service provider in Ottawa, Ontario, Canada.

lender.name: Bart
lender.loan_because: My mother was already involved in microloans many, many years ago. I think it is the best way to help developing countries: to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Crunching numbers, help people to extract data out of various sources and turn them into readable information

lender.name: Maxime
lender.occupation: a class of students specialised in banking (FRANCE

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I started my own business not very long ago. I now it can be hard and you can use all the help you get. Now we use a portion of our profit to invest in people all around the world, so that they can also be succesful in their business.
lender.occupational_info: I own a photostudio for commercial photography.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupational_info: I work with teenagers who have had less opportunities in life to get ahead in education. My goal is to make sure that all of my students get the opportunity to go to college.

lender.name: Asad and Sabiha
lender.loan_because: We believe in the entrepreneurial spirit - with the right support and hard work, anyone can succeed regardless of race, religion or ethnicity. This is our small contribution.
lender.occupational_info: Asad is a information technology project manager (works with computers) and Sabiha is a physician (doctor)

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I am a single mother who has struggled to support my son and God has blessed me. And my mother has helped me tremendously. I believe we should all give back when good things have been done for us.

lender.name: MATTIE
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.

lender.name: Timothy & Jackie
lender.loan_because: I believe if every one would think of other people. and help someone in the world, the world will be a better place.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: If I can help, I will !
lender.occupational_info: I provide medication and information on medication to the geriatric population

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I would like to help empower others to better their lives for themselves and their children.
lender.occupational_info: I educate young children.

lender.name: Peter F.
lender.loan_because: We must not only give what we have; we must also give what we are.

lender.name: Sally and David
lender.loan_because: this donation is a Christmas gift made in our names - by Sarah and Stephen.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because:
I love people and want to help. We can all do more. Let's share our good and change the world!
I am an entrepreneur and really respect others who want to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank that provides credit card processing services to merchants.

lender.name: Ariana
lender.loan_because: I would like to share what I can with others to help their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children, ages 7-12, how to use computers as a tool to enhance learning in all subjects.

lender.name: Jeffery
lender.loan_because: I feel as though I've lived a pretty privelaged life. If I can, through this small gesture, help someone make a better life for themselves and their families then I'm more than happy to do it.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be in the position to do so. I had people help me get where I am, so it's just right that I pass that support along.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in the operations center of a bank, providing business planning and performance management services to our North American operating groups. .

lender.name: Magda
lender.loan_because: there is great need
lender.occupational_info: I teach middle eastern dance to women

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I can, I'm blessed, and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I work with kids who are in legal trouble. I try to keep them from getting into more trouble

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to give something back from my photography.

lender.name: Nikki
lender.loan_because: I want to help make an impact in people's lives. I think Kiva is a wonderful way for average people to join together to help others in the world who are striving to better their lives and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am self-employed and work in computer graphics educational publishing producing school books for middle school and high school students.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I enjoy a good life and want others to have the opportunity to enjoy theirs.
lender.occupational_info: I help to make sure the airplane parts my company produces are safe for use.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe we need to help eachother whether it is next door or across the world. We will find a way to end violence and discrimination towards women and children (through education and economic viability) and then we will see more peace in the world. When women are valued and honored, societies function so much better. So I donate to women.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mental health nurse and professor. I also am an advocate to help end domestic violence where I live in the United States.

lender.name: Bruce & Kelly
lender.occupational_info: Self -Protection instructors for Women and Children

lender.name: DHJ
lender.loan_because: Giving back- It's the Christian thing to do and I think President Clinton knows what he's doing.
lender.occupational_info: You name it I have done it !

lender.name: Seb
lender.loan_because: we can all benefit from the efficient and meaningful use of capital.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: It's important for us to help others that have needs that are much greater than our own. Helping to give opportunity to others in need.......speaks for itself.
lender.occupational_info: Medical Surgical Device field

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: It just feels right!

lender.name: RGL
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of making a personal connection to people.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a community foundation to help people to learn how to give strategically.

lender.name: Fatima
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in people's lives. Every bit helps!
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student and work three part time jobs.

lender.name: Barb and Quentin
lender.occupation: retired teacher and glass factory worker
lender.loan_because: We wanted to invest in something that would be directly helpful to others. The "interest" earned is in the heart rather than monetary.

lender.name: Larry
lender.occupational_info: I work with families who are breaking up & try to minimize the trauma on the children

lender.name: Celia
lender.occupational_info:
I am a student. I study all the time.
I am also a pharmacy technician.

lender.name: Kirsten
lender.loan_because: It makes a diference.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I was given a Kiva giftcard from my aunt and would love to help turn someone's life around.

lender.name: Cake-O
lender.loan_because: I always wanted to travel to these countries and help. Kiva is a cool innovative way to contribute to our society.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I love being part of the solution, and to help people who are helping themselves.

lender.name: AmbidextrousMusic
lender.loan_because: If it's wasn't for people like my brother/business partner, his wife & my wife I wouldn't have my on production company and be able to follow my dreams. So I want to give others the same kind of help that I got.
lender.occupational_info: We write and produce music for artist, my self included, as well as networks like FOX Sports Net who are our biggest client. We also promote nostalgic hip-hop events called "Deja Vu It's 92" in Houston to preserve the legacy of authentic hip-hop at it best. Our future goals are to get into film & we have a tee-shirt line ready to launch in 08 called LOCTURNAL. It's all entertainment so everything we do is one in the same.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because:
Entrepreneurs can change the world. When people connect through great services like Kiva, great things happen.
I started my career in the non-profit sector with the US-Baltic Foundation, providing educational and technical aid. My cousin works in microfinance in Benin. It is truly amazing how effective it can be.
lender.occupational_info:
I am an entrepreneur that most recently co-founded Socialtext. We make wiki software like what powers Wikipedia. "Wiki Wiki" means "very quick" in Hawaiian and wikis are wonderfuly simple tools for collaboration.
Socialtext often donates wikis in-kind to non-profit organizations and by default provide a 50% discount to them.

lender.name: Marc
lender.occupational_info: I work as an engineer so I can afford to farm.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: If I can afford 3-4 "Grande Breve Chai Lattes" at month from Starbucks, I can afford to help someone with much higher aspirations. ;-)

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: When I was 15, no one would give me the opportunity to work. That is when I opened my first business and I have been self-employed every since.
lender.occupational_info: I have organized my company to the point of franchising it out to others so they also have a chance at fulfilling their dreams.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with many opportunities in my life and I believe in paying it forward. I volunteer with three local organizations and am looking for ways to help globally.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company and am responsible for generating quotes for the products that we sell.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate and I enjoy sharing it.
lender.occupational_info: I make teaching programs that run from computers.

lender.name: Christopher & Allison
lender.loan_because: we have been blessed to be able to help so it is something that everyone that can do should do. This gives everyone the chance that they deserve.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: I want to give people in other countries a chance to feel successful and make their own lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I help people use computer programs my company makes. The programs help companies sell products to customers.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: I love helping people.
lender.occupational_info: Military member.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: giving is the most rewarding experience.

lender.name: DWIGHT
lender.loan_because: I'd like to try and help others achieve in life.

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I interact with all aspects of the business in Accounting, Finance, Operations. This involves training, auditing, business process improvements.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I admire hard working people creating better lives for their families
lender.occupational_info: I own and manage industrial property and small business owners are my tenants

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: It makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to use their money effectively.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone who desires to have a better life should have the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I represent people in legal disputes as an attorney or mediator, and try to help them find practical, workable solutions to their legal problems.

lender.name: Jean-Franois
lender.loan_because: That's how you change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I transform data in actions.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I am touched by the small amount of money that can make a big difference in someone's life. I also want to teach my kids to be good global citizens and to help and respect people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my three kids. They are 8,3, and 2.

lender.name: kerry
lender.loan_because: i believe that those in a country benefitting from a global economy have a responsibility to expanding global opportunity...and it's nice :)
lender.occupational_info: I am a caseworker for a non-profit agency under the Illinois Department on Aging. I meet with low-income older adults in my county to help them gain access to government-supported programs. Our goal is to assis these individuals in staying in their own homes as long as possible, and helping them make choices about long-term institutionalized care.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I know that the money is being put to good use by people who are motivated to improve their lives and the lives of their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work with students struggling with learning and behavioral disabilities in the school setting.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are working to build, expand or improve a business to support themselves and others, and to deliver useful products and services to their customers.
lender.occupational_info: I help people and businesses improve their business and their lives.

lender.name: Kendall
lender.loan_because: I am a big supporter of microfinance and it is a great way for people to be connected across the globe. I wrote my senior college paper on microfinance and have been involved ever since.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an international exchange company called Intrax. I set up international students/ au pairs with host families in the U.S.A.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: It feels like the right thing to do.

lender.name: coolidge
lender.loan_because: i beleave strongly in a hand up!

lender.name: DAN&CHERYL
lender.loan_because: I HAVE A GOOD LIFE AND WANT TO HELP..
lender.occupational_info: I REPAIR COMMERCIAL FOOD PROCESS EQ.

lender.name: Agrim
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great concept, Kiva has been doing a fantastic job and I loan because I think peace and prosperity go hand in hand

lender.name: Las Family
lender.loan_because: We' have gotten to a stage in our lives where we realize that we have been blessed and it's time to give back as a family!! We want to no longer just live, but make a difference!!
lender.occupational_info: I work in a bank and try to help people reach their financial goals. My wife works with students and is bilingual in Spanish. Our Children are students!!

lender.name: Guy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: It's very tough and you need to work very hard if you want to become a baller.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase raw land, clear it, clean it, make it usable then sell for a profit.

lender.name: Mark, Jennifer & Q
lender.loan_because: We are so grateful for all the things we have and want to give back to others. This is a great way to help others across the world help themselves and we look forward to this opportunity repeating itself.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a program that helps homeowners get control of their financial situation, get out of debt and build financial security.

lender.name: ;Robert
lender.loan_because: I want to help people out of unconditional love
lender.occupational_info: moving mountains of need to mountains of joy

lender.name: Kalli
lender.loan_because: I just love the idea of microloans and believe they really can make a difference in poor economies.
lender.occupational_info: My work has mostly been sitting at my computer making text and pictures look great on paper or internet.

lender.name: shirlee
lender.loan_because: I recieve joy from helping people

lender.name: Sophia
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I sell residential real estate

lender.name: Noorani
lender.loan_because: it brings me happiness

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: "there but by the grace of God"; my Lord asks this of me and I want to help
lender.occupational_info: We are all God's children. I pray for your success!

lender.name: myrna
lender.loan_because: Helping others helps me
lender.occupational_info: Building of Peace and Compassion

lender.name: Rick Kenney
lender.loan_because: It's right.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that when people are working towards a goal, they can succeed.

lender.name: reiner
lender.loan_because: this is reiners first loan. Reiner died on 2.11.07 . the idea of kiva is still living- and of cause reiner allways try to support the poorest , we lend the rest of money on his account, in his name. so his little money start a long way as loan and hopefully it never stops and help again and again people to change their lifes. so even if reiner is dead his love to the poorest and to the world will be still alive.

lender.name: Genevive
lender.loan_because: I want to give others, particularly women, a bit of support because I've been lucky enough to always receive support to reach my own goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of mental health.

lender.name: Lex
lender.loan_because: I believe when people work together they can achieve great things, and that everyone should have the opportunity to live their dreams

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: It's just one small thing I can do to feel like I contribute to our global society.

lender.name: Autis
lender.loan_because: Just wanted to help.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It is a wonderful way to give someone who wants to succeed a helping hand up and not a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: I have the luxury of staying at home with my 3 children.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: We have so much in Canada and we waste a great deal of what is given to us in this country. To give reminds me of what I have and that I should be grateful. I hope my pittance will help families educate their children.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a university department in one of Canada's top institutions. I am very proud to work for McGill University and the McGill School of Environment.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I spend my money on things I later end up either not using, or selling. I give to others in the hopes that they will use the money wisely, and their lives will be better because of it.
lender.occupational_info: I'm looking for a place in the world.

lender.name: Andrea and Allison W.
lender.loan_because: Our aunt made these contributions for our Christmas gifts....

lender.name: Doreen
lender.loan_because: I have experienced the struggle!!!
lender.occupational_info: I sell out-of-print and rare books to collectors and buyers all over the world.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: It is just the right thing to do.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world no matter how small it may seem.
lender.occupational_info: I teach electrical students how to install electricity safely.

lender.name: Teemu
lender.occupational_info: I work for sales.

lender.name: Jayne
lender.loan_because: I want to make a differance in this world. It makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: We mine for gold by washing the gravels and seperate and recover the gold. Placer means that the gold is in the gravels.

lender.name: JAMES C.
lender.loan_because: Because I can, and I want to help. I want to go to heaven at the end.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an Oil and Gas Company in the Gulf of Mexico. I am a Lead Operator On a platform

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: It felt so great to get my first loan re-paid back to me. Now I've re-loaned it out to help another person.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I feel the need to contribute to the world around me.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I realize how blessed I have been and wish to help make those less fortunate than I take pride in their accomplishments.
lender.occupational_info: I worked 38 years as an operator for a large telephone company. I am now retired and do a lot of volunteering in my community. I just lost my husband two days ago and am trying to continue my life as he would have wanted.

lender.name: Darrell
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to fund a dream/occupation to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I worked for a global company that did business all over the world. I have seen many cultures and personal circumstances.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I loan for my own selfish reason's ..I simply love to help people and I think that this orgainization is amazing..sometimes a little bit of money is all someone needs to get on thier feet and make a difference in thier life: A family business empowers people to help themselves. Kiva empowers me to financially help someone make a difference in thier life. Thank You Kiva and Thank you Oprah for telling us about this amazing organization and giving us this opportunity to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a single mom I have 1 biological daughter and 3 foster siblings. I hope one day that when they leave my home that i have improved thier life in someway and that they will pass it down to their children. pay it forward

lender.name: Mirko
lender.loan_because: ... everybody should do it who can afford.
lender.occupational_info: Making things happen.

lender.name: Marianne Hutchings
lender.loan_because: Anyone with the dream of making a better life deserves the chance to make that dream a reality.

lender.name: Sylvia
lender.loan_because: everyone should do something to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can ... and I should.

lender.name: karla
lender.occupational_info: I am a grade 11 student from Canada.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur and would like to help other women entrepreneurs succeed and improve their lives and hopefully create jobs for others as well.

lender.name: Lauryn
lender.loan_because: Helping is my favorite verb.
lender.occupational_info: I'll make it simple. Exciting.

lender.name: Emilia
lender.loan_because: I have a choice.
lender.occupational_info: Professional, freelance artist designer,. Proficient with Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Specializing in surface design, textile art and photography.

lender.name: Janet
lender.occupational_info: office work in a hospital

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to help people overseas that I wouldn't normally be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student at the University of Western Ontario. I am working on getting a teachers degree to teach primary grades.

lender.name: Jaime
lender.loan_because: When given the opportunity, we all thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I fuse two languages, convey concepts and make things clear for all involved.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: I think this is one of the BEST ideas anyone ever came up with!

lender.name: Phyllis
lender.loan_because: my family and I are so blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I teach choir and piano lab at a Chicago high school for the arts.

lender.name: Rhonda
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be where I am in this life.

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: I believe that one of the best ways to resolve poverty is to help empower people.
lender.occupational_info: I have always had an entrepreneurs' spirit. I have had many different types of businesses. I say find the one thing that you love and go for it, and then keep going and going!

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: It was a challenge from Franciscan Sister Ada Kroll, based on her distribution to friends of the money gifts she received commemorating her 50th year as a Franciscan Sister of Little Falls, MN
lender.occupational_info: Faithful Fools build community in the Tenderloin of San Francisco CA through street retreats, neighborhood potlucks, art shows, clowning, magic, film foolstival, poetry open mike, helping people stay housed, helping people get their social services, educating City Hall about street realities. Check us out on the web!

lender.name: Soli and Peaches
lender.loan_because: We can give hope to People that otherwise would never qualify for loans anywhere else in their Countries. Why not help when We can do it?
lender.occupational_info: I work behind a desk in a Point of Service for a very well known Insurance Provider. I receive phone calls from Partner Insurance Agents and assist with any questions on policy that may arise.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves a chance and needs to know that at least one person in this world believes in them.
lender.occupational_info: I provide nursing care for kids 6yrs. & under.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage all people to strive for success in their lives. If I can help someone do that... then why not!
lender.occupational_info: Very rewarding and physically and emotionally challenging. You are impacting the futures and lives of young children and hopefully putting them on a positive life track!

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupational_info: Art !

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I am very happy to able to make a living as a self employed seamstress and I want to help others find the same success and happiness working for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Sewing alterations and repairs for retail stores and individuals in my city.

lender.name: carrie
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone a chance to live a happier life.

lender.name: Ervin
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I translate documents from one language to another.

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: It is one of the beautiful compensations of this life that no one can sincerely try to help another without helping himself. - Charles Dudley

lender.name: Barry & Karen
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a little help and this is one way to assist someone to improve their life

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: it's who I am.
lender.occupational_info: Work for a television station doing contract administration from home. Data entry and reports. I've worked for them for 12 years, the last 4 years from home on contract after I had children.

lender.name: Meislik Family
lender.loan_because: We are interested in helping small businesses in the developing world and we are investigating starting a micro-lending fund.
lender.occupational_info: Karen helps families with legal issues.

lender.name: Sophia
lender.loan_because: It takes so little to offer some one else so much. Why wouldn't you. This site helps fill some the needs I found I had after getting a degree in Women's Studies. I like to think I am helping another woman be self sufficient and live a better life somewhere in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I went to school for women's studies and art. I did (and still do some) drawing and painting and sculpture and lithography or printmaking and I learned about women's issues (women's lives now and in the past as well some things about women all over the world) I am a mother of one daughter and I live and work in Toronto Canada now. I would like to find a way to pass the gifts I have been given on to other people.

lender.name: Cat
lender.loan_because: God wishes that we share our good fortune and bless others. It truly lifts our spirit, when we assist one in need or help achieve one's dream. Blessings to all for reaching out and supporting this wonderful initiative.
lender.occupational_info: I luv my precious cats, my outdoor feathered friends and enjoy the simple things in life. Primarily, I worked in Admin./IT Contracting and also served as a volunteer Union Rep. I retired summer 2010 and look forward to all the opportunities that cross my path.

lender.name: Oliver Wilhelm
lender.loan_because: A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush

lender.name: Tonya
lender.loan_because: Working with Kiva allows me to help others. It is another way to show you do not have to be rich to help change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I love being able to make a difference!

lender.name: Ahren
lender.loan_because: I am a college student, and I could not have gone to college myself, without a loan. Loans are very important. They help people who want to make their own lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student studying Computer Science, at California Polytechnic University, in San Luis Obispo, California.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: We are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a 13 yr digital professional and am so proud to be a part of an industry that is spreading the power of Microfinance. Nerds rock!

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much in my life, and it is important to me to show my daughter how small things can change the world, rather than sitting around and talking about it all day!
lender.occupational_info: Lots of studying to become an anthropologist

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: Everyday I work with businesses and colleagues all over the world and help them grow. I love to travel and the best part of any trip is the people I meet. I was an entrepreneur before I went into a corporate role and greatly admire every person that has the ambition , drive and perseverance to create their own destiny. I believe the world is small, we're all neighbours, and helping eachother is only natural.
lender.occupational_info: I am a global marketing manager for a major international technology firm.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It is important to give back and give people the chance to improve their life! If we all do something, our world will be a better place for our children.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a Second language to Adults.

lender.name: Cari
lender.loan_because: I can reach out across thousands of miles and help, one on one from me to you.
lender.occupational_info: I run a team of specialists to create cumputer systems for the company I work for and it's customers.

lender.name: Albert
lender.loan_because: I wish to give!
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and have returned to university for further education.

lender.name: Mahendra
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who have the courage and the will to work hard and support themselves & their family. This is true capitalism..
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that makes Jet engines for the largest and most poweful airplanes to the small business jets.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: What better way to show human compassion than to give the money you would spend on your daily Starbucks coffee to people who can then in turn help their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Airline Representative. In addition to working as a senior Supervisor in a demanding hospital setting supervising technicians who provide acute care to all areas of a 800 plus bed hospital.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I can. I want to encourage women in impoverished areas start and be successful with their businesses.

lender.name: Michael & Chhaya
lender.loan_because: Helping individuals with money is the next best thing to actually helping them in person.
lender.occupational_info: IMichael runs a small business involved in selling dental instruments; Chhaya is a medical doctor who specializes in glandular problems in children.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: giving makes my happy

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: I would like to help someone out to make their life easier

lender.name: Anders
lender.loan_because: I think it's a briliant idea to make the world more equal and less tense.
lender.occupational_info: I'm making sure that my team creates and deliver what is expected by an agreement.

lender.name: Sondra
lender.loan_because: Much was given to me as a young struggling parent. I'll never forget that.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse in a hospital

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: it is such a small thing to me, and such a huge thing for the person receiving the help.
lender.occupational_info: I am the manager of a small pet store. I love my job. I am also a wife, and a mother of am amazing beautiful little spirit who is 3.5 years old.

lender.name: Marcy & Bob
lender.loan_because: it makes us happy to support someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: Marcy is a teacher. She teaches 4th grade students who have special needs or disabilities.

lender.name: Les
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to help people help themselves, their family and their community.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I connect companies looking for engineers with engineers looking for a new opportunity. It's great because I get to help people.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I am my brothers keeper and I feel responsible for others. Imagine if each person helped another person in the world. You don't have to be a millionaire to help. I love KIVA this is such a great idea - I saw this on Oprah and am telling all my friends to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a secretary and shuffle papers and I teach ESL (English as a Second Language) at Marietta College. I love to work with people and help them.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I know I can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I teach 3rd grade.

lender.name: Trisha
lender.loan_because: There is a time in everyone's life when they need the help of others and I have been fortunate to have been given a lot of help in my life and want to pass it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher. I teach children who have hearing impairments, and I work with them one on one at their school. I teach children from four years old to 18, and we work on everything from speech and language skills, school work, to social skills.

lender.name: Sheri
lender.loan_because: I am consantly seeking out ways in which I can help others and connect with other parts of the world I live in. Although my budget is limited, I believe that every little bit helps.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying English Literature at The University of Toronto and I am hoping to go to graduate school. I have a freelance writing business and I am a part-time musician.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Every single person deserves the dignity of working and supporting themselves. Charity is most often what they need the least. What people need is a little help to get going.
lender.occupational_info: I register documents and plans for land ownership in British Columbia Canada.

lender.name: Line
lender.loan_because: I just think it's a good think
lender.occupational_info: I working in hospital too give the people the medicament that they need. Excuse my english, my languahge is french

lender.name: Gordon
lender.loan_because: I have so much and feel very fortunate to be able to help others. The biggest gift we receive is the gift of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise a number of retail stores with sales in the tens of millions of dollars.

lender.name: Krysta
lender.loan_because: I started working a real on-the-books job a few months ago [Im only fifteen] and realized how hard a dollar is to earn, so I decided to use my money for something good.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare/serve food and clean up afterwards. The hours arent that great but Im thankful I have it.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I'm a big believer in helping others start a business & thru KIVA, it can be done with a minimal of money.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired, but had my own embroidery business for ten years. It was done with a machine, rather than with the skills of hand work!!

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to help and show my children everyone can make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I am a married Mom of two and I work part time for a courier company.

lender.name: Daianna
lender.loan_because: "We are here not to see through one another, but to see one another through"...I read that somewhere and carry that with me wherever I go...couple that with the fact that I was born in Canada (granting me an unearned advantage over billions of my fellow human beings) I strongly believe it is my moral obligation to assist those who need it. I also believe in "teaching to fish" and Kiva helps me do just that....and really...helping just makes me happy. Kind of selfish, I know ;)
lender.occupational_info: I'm responsible for a team of people that create and manage communcation pieces and programs designed to create awareness for our company and its' products. We write and create newsletters, sales presentations, promotional items and advertising.

lender.name: Nyman Family
lender.loan_because: We loan because we know how lucky we are to be farming in Canada. No matter where you go, farming is a challenging and rewarding business and we enjoy helping others get to do it.
lender.occupational_info: My husband drives a transport truck to help pay our bills. He's often away for days at a time. I take a few neighbourhood children in for day care and run entrepreneurship programs for teenagers. We also run what is considered a small sheep farm with 75 sheep!
